page.title: 10RACING STABLES.
page.content: Horse racing was established here long ago and there are several stables in the area.The old{MALTON RACE TRACK was only closed about 1850 when it was sold off for farming and planted with trees.All the stables share the use and upkeep of the Training "Gallops" on Langton Wold.{KENNYTHORPE STABLES,} with its Colts,Fillies and Geldings,is in our area.It is mainly for "jumpers" which race over fences,although there are some "sprinters" here.The "Flat" season is their quiet time,so only 30 of their 41 boxes are occupied. { Thoroughbred Yearlings,}bought in September,are broken-in and trained to start their racing after 6 weeks.Most stay with the stable all their career and may even race in Europe.The best may go to "Stud",later,and the rest retire or carry on racing in countries where the standards are lower.
